DOC.brief_summary: To assess steady state pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , safety tolerability AVP-786 ( deuterated [ d6 ] dextromethorphan hydrobromide [ DM ] /quinidine sulfate [ Q ] ) paroxetine AVP-786 duloxetine .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Drug Interaction Study Between AVP-786 Paroxetine Between AVP-786 Duloxetine Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male females 18 50 year age BMI 18 30 kg/m2 History presence significant disease History substance abuse and/or alcohol abuse past 3 year Use tobaccocontaining nicotinecontaining product within 6 month Use prescription overthecounter medication within 14 day
